resources.string: You must write your phone number
How do you feel right now?
You must write your email address
Thank you for downloading the application.\n Please fill up the following form to participate in the research.
Soon you\'ll start receiving notifications. Remember that it is not mandatory to perform an action on all of them.

All the collected information is anonymous and will not be shared with a third party.
This application only uses WiFi to send data. It will not consume MB from your mobile data plan.
 Once the study is over you will receive an email letting you know. This email contains a link to a survey that you must answer.
 For any additional information, please contact ignacio.menares@ing.uchile.cl
